text.text: This is an advertisement for a local wildlife exhibit, claiming to have new and exciting animals on display.  Strangely, the only imagery on it is a stylized silhouette of a T. Rex.  The flier reads "Witness the rebirth of the extinct, grand opening this week!"
"Why is that place just fucking crawling with lizards?"
"Fellow scaly bretheren!  Tonight we feast on the hairless apes."
"where's some .700 t-rex medicine when you need it?"
"So is this what happens when you stray off the path and step on a butterfly?"
